thread.title: AHN Sports Complex at Cool Springs Grand Opening
thread.title_full: AHN Sports Complex at Cool Springs Grand Opening

title: AHN Sports Complex at Cool Springs Grand Opening
text:
AHN Sports Complex at Cool Springs Grand Opening Where 
12:00 p.m. Saturday, Oct. 31, 2015 Categories 
Events, Kids | Family, Sports The Allegheny Health Network is celebrating the grand opening of the Indoor Sports Complex at Cool Springs on Saturday, October 31. This family-friendly event will include trick-or-treating, face-painting, appearances by the Pittsburgh Riverhounds, Three Sides Band, and so much more!
